messages.title: Luciana Berger
messages.content: Building a brighter future for our area

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Luciana is one of the country’s leading anti-Brexit campaigners and will continue to fight to remain in the EU in Parliament.
Luciana will push for urgent investment in our schools, local police and youth services; to cut air pollution and affordable housing.
Luciana has a proven track record of putting people before party – the best way to stop Brexit and bring our country together.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for the Labour candidate will only help Boris Johnson’s Conservative candidate to win, Labour 21%, Con 25%, Lib Dem 33%.

issues.brexitEurope: A strong anti-Brexit voice. Luciana is one of the country’s leading anti-Brexit campaigners and will continue to fight to remain in the EU in Parliament. Facilitating Brexit. The Conservative candidate chose to take a paid job in Boris Johnson's government facilitating the Tories' damaging deal.
issues.education: Luciana will push for urgent investment in our schools.
issues.environment: Luciana will push for urgent investment to cut air pollution.
issues.health: Luciana will push for urgent investment in our schools, local police and youth services; to cut air pollution and affordable housing.
issues.lawCrime: Luciana will push for urgent investment in local police and youth services. Damaging our public services. The Conservative candidate has chosen to back Boris Johnson's damaging public sector cuts and has voted against investment in our local NHS and schools.

community.content: Luciana will push for urgent investment to cut air pollution and affordable housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: A ward winning MP Luciana Berger is known as a hardworking MP who always puts her principles before narrow party politics.

endorsements.endorsement: The Lib Dem fightback is real and it’s changing everything.

quotes.text: The Lib Dem fightback is real and it’s changing everything.

images.caption: Right across the UK, Jo Swinson’s Liberal Democrats are winning and gaining momentum.

examples: Gained over 700 new councillors in May’s local elections.
The Lib Dem fightback is real and it’s changing everything.
A hardworking MP who always puts her principles before narrow party politics.
Luciana will push for urgent investment in our schools.
Luciana will push for urgent investment to cut air pollution and affordable housing.
